home.description: I am a young developer with two years of real programming experience. Passionate about manga, video games, sports, and development in Java and TypeScript, I enjoy tackling technical challenges and continuously improving my skills. Motivated and rigorous, I am always ready to learn new technologies and collaborate effectively in teams to successfully carry out innovative projects. My goal is to design high-performance and optimized solutions while contributing to a dynamic and stimulating work environment.

stack.title: WHO I AM
stack.description: I am a passionate full stack web developer with experience in JavaScript, React.js, Node.js, and many other modern technologies.

education.title: MY ACADEMIC JOURNEY
education.description: Here is my educational background and training.

degree1.title: Master's in Web Development
degree1.description: Specialization in modern web application development with React and Node.js. Projects completed in teams and individually.

degree2.title: Bachelor's in Computer Science
degree2.description: General computer science education with a specialization in software development and databases.

degree3.title: Scientific Baccalaureate
degree3.description: Mathematics and Engineering Sciences option, with highest honors.

experience.title: MY PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE
experience.description: Here are my most significant professional experiences.

job1.title: Full Stack Developer
job1.description: Development of modern web applications with React, TypeScript, and Node.js. Agile team work with Scrum methodology.

job2.title: Front-End Developer
job2.description: Design and development of responsive and accessible user interfaces for various clients.

job3.title: Developer Intern
job3.description: End-of-studies internship focused on developing a mobile application with React Native.

projects.title: MY RECENT WORK
